movie-description: Control Lu Mu Bi, Shu Lien, Jen, and Dark Cloud as you take part in the story of the film Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon. This time however, your actions decide the final ending.
movie-short-description: With Yun-Fat Chow, Michelle Yeoh, Stephen Chang. Control Lu Mu Bi, Shu Lien, Jen, and Dark Cloud as you take part in the story of the film Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon. This time however, your actions decide the final ending.
